meanings.definition: Relating to the changes undergone by sediments after their initial deposition.

meanings.sent3: The diagenetically modified soil seemed to have a secret life of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her diagenetically transformed garden bloomed with hidden stories beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The diagenetically affected layers revealed a history written in stone.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to the process of diagenesis.
meanings.sent1: The sediments were compacted diagenetically over time.
meanings.sent2: The minerals moved diagenetically through the layers of rock.
meanings.sent3: The water flowed diagenetically, changing the landscape slowly.
meanings.sent4: His ideas evolved diagenetically, influenced by various factors.
